questions.question: 1. Pharmacovigilance is concerned only about two outcomes regarding a drug. They are:
questions.rational: Pharmacovigilance is one of the most essential functions within a life science company. It is concerned only about two outcomes regarding a drug. They are: 1. Safety 2. Efficacy

questions.question: 2. Rawlin and Thomas Classification was created is in regard to adverse drug reactions.
questions.rational: The Rawlin and Thomas Classification was devised in 1991. In this, Adverse Drug Reactions are divided into Type A, Type B and Others which include Type C, D and E.

questions.question: 3. What is Adverse Effect?
choices: a) It is the undesired harmful effect resulting from any sort of medication, treatments or surgeries.
b) It is an injury resulting from the use of a drug
c) It is an injury caused by some medication.
questions.rational: Adverse Effect is the undesired harmful effect resulting from any sort of medication, treatments or surgeries.

questions.question: 4. Pharmacodynamic effects are of two types – Desirable and undesirable.
questions.rational: Pharmacodynamics is the study of how a dug affects an organism. Pharmacodynamic effects are of two types – Desirable and undesirable.
